contactId.title: contactId
contactId.description: Optional, if included, the 'completedModules' product list will include a list of modules completed by this contact that do not need to be 're-purchased'. This is an 18 character alphanumeric Id.

productCategoryId.title: productCategoryId
productCategoryId.description:
The certification_ productCategoryIdInstructions of the chosen certification product category. This will never be a career type product category record.
This is an 18 character alphanumeric Id.

storeId.title: storeId
storeId.description: The storeId of the current store the user is in. This is an 18 character alphanumeric Id.
